function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High air change rates due to occupant behavior","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease spread due to higher ventilation rates","Mitigation":"Education and communication with occupants about proper ventilation practices","Technologies":"Occupancy sensors for HVAC systems, smart thermostats with ventilation controls","People":"Occupants, building residents","Owner":"Building management, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Inability to differentiate between air loss to outdoors and to adjacent apartments","Impact":"Difficulty in accurately assessing air change rates and ventilation effectiveness","Mitigation":"Use of multiple tracer gases to differentiate between different paths of air loss","Technologies":"Tracer gas analysis equipment, air flow measurement devices","People":"Building maintenance staff, ventilation system experts","Owner":"Building management, ventilation system experts"}]}
